title: Curtain (Basement of Doom)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Curtains are found in the Evil Dave's Basement of Doom, and are used to access the Hell-Rat Behemoths. A player can use their cat on the curtain, or attempt to enter it with their cat following them, in order to let their cat fight a behemoth. If the player attempts to enter the curtain themselves without a cat, they will be told that they are too big to enter the narrow alcove. Using a pet that isn't a hellcat on the curtain will open an interface with the message "Regrettably, that pet isn't sufficiently interested in killing rats.".

Curtain

Map
Advanced data
Object ID539

Curtains are found in the Evil Dave's Basement of Doom, and are used to access the Hell-Rat Behemoths. A player can use their cat on the curtain, or attempt to enter it with their cat following them, in order to let their cat fight a behemoth. If the player attempts to enter the curtain themselves without a cat, they will be told that they are too big to enter the narrow alcove. Using a pet that isn't a hellcat on the curtain will open an interface with the message "Regrettably, that pet isn't sufficiently interested in killing rats.".

Buckets of milk or raw fish can be used on the curtain to heal the cat inside while it fights the Hell-rat Behemoths.

'''Curtains''' are found in the [[Evil Dave]]'s [[Basement of Doom]], and are used to access the [[Hell-Rat Behemoth]]s. A player can use their [[cat]] on the curtain, or attempt to enter it with their cat following them, in order to let their cat fight a behemoth. If the player attempts to enter the curtain themselves without a cat, they will be told that they are too big to enter the narrow alcove. Using a pet that isn't a hellcat on the curtain will open an interface with the message "Regrettably, that pet isn't sufficiently interested in killing rats.".

[[Bucket of milk|Buckets of milk]] or [[raw fish]] can be used on the curtain to heal the cat inside while it fights the Hell-rat Behemoths.
